snippet.title: FROM DUSK TIL DAWN Game Official Trailer (2001) - Nostalgia
snippet.description:
Condemned to death for the Titty Twister murders, Seth Gecko must again face vampires in the fictional Rising Sun high-security prison ! Join us on Facebook http://facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial & Twitter http://twitter.com/gamenewstrailer. This FPS / horror game is based on and is a sequel to the 1996 motion picture From Dusk Till Dawn directed by Robert Rodriguez and starring George Clooney and Quentin Tarantino.

[Nostalgia] From Dusk Till Dawn Video Game Trailer. This videogame adaptation was released in 2001 for Windows PC and distributed by Cryo Interactive. Subscribe now to get the latest game teasers, gameplay trailers, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos !
